name: cucumber-java-runner
description: VS Code extension for running Cucumber Feature files in Java projects

cucumberJavaRunner.enableCodeLens.description: Enable CodeLens buttons (‚ñ∂ Run, üêõ Debug) in feature files. When disabled, use Test Explorer instead for a cleaner interface.

cucumberJavaRunner.objectFactory.description: Custom Cucumber ObjectFactory class (e.g., for Spring, Guice, PicoContainer). Leave empty to use default.
cucumberJavaRunner.objectFactory.markdownDescription:
Custom Cucumber `ObjectFactory` class for dependency injection. Common values:
- Spring: `cucumber.api.spring.SpringFactory`
- Guice: `cucumber.api.guice.GuiceFactory`
- PicoContainer: `cucumber.api.picocontainer.PicoFactory`

cucumberJavaRunner.autoCompileMaven.description: Automatically compile Maven projects before running tests (only when target directory is missing).

cucumberJavaRunner.excludeBuildDirectori.description: Directories to exclude when discovering feature files to avoid duplicates.

cucumberJavaRunner.additionalGluePaths.description: Additional glue paths for step definitions (e.g., from external libraries). Use Java package format like 'com.external.library.steps'.
cucumberJavaRunner.additionalGluePaths.markdownDescription:
Additional glue paths for Cucumber step definitions. Useful when using step definitions from external libraries or modules.

Example:
```json
[
  "com.external.library.steps",
  "org.another.library.cucumber.steps"
]
```

enumDescriptions: Show general information, warnings, and errors (default)
Show detailed debug information (recommended for troubleshooting)
Show very detailed trace information (step-by-step execution)
cucumberJavaRunner.logLevel.description: Set the logging level for the extension. Higher levels include all lower level messages.
cucumberJavaRunner.logLevel.markdownDescription:
Control how much information the extension logs:
- **error**: Only critical errors
- **warn**: Warnings + errors
- **info**: General info + warnings + errors (default)
- **debug**: Detailed debug info (recommended for troubleshooting)
- **trace**: Very detailed step-by-step execution

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.install-local: npm run package && cursor --install-extension $(ls -t cucumber-java-runner-*.vsix | head -1)
scripts.build-and-install: npm run compile && npm run install-local
